name: Name of your experiment
description: Explains the what and the why. What is the main idea? What is the purpose? Describes the coding process and implementation choices and gives a high level system overview.

name: Cubic Disarray
description: Georg Nee's artwork was the inspiration. I transposed the code of the generative artistry to p5 for this example and added a slider (switch), to displace the cubes.

name: Perlin Noise Cirlce
description: The Coding Train created a Perlin Noise loop, which inspired me. I added an Oscillator because I thought, to hear the sin Wave would make an amazing effect. At this point, I could only change the frequency with the r value.
